name: artivo-demo
description: Artivo demo application using Elevenlabs's Realtime API with Jambonz integration

scripts.test-routing: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {agentRouter} = require('./lib/utils'); const logger = {info: console.log, warn: console.warn, error: console.error}; console.log('ðŸ§ª Agent Routing Test'); agentRouter.listAgentConfigurations(logger); console.log('Examples:'); ['908503351053', '905551234567'].forEach(phone => { const agent = agentRouter.selectAgentForCall(phone, logger); console.log(phone + ' -> ' + (agent || 'DEFAULT')); });"

author: Hoan HL
